Constructor Detail

WordTestRecordOptions

public WordTestRecordOptions()

This is a helper bean to pass options to TestRecords so that unwanted tests dont have to be saved, or retrieved.

Members such as type, user_name, and root_path are added just so that the calling methods dont have to have an endless string of arguments.

WordTestRecordOptions

public WordTestRecordOptions(java.lang.String type,
                             java.lang.String user_name,
                             java.lang.String root_path,
                             java.util.Hashtable user_opts)
This convenient constructor takes care of populating the wtro from the user options hash. The original version that didnt have ids.

WordTestRecordOptions

                             java.lang.String user_name,
                             java.lang.String root_path,
                             java.util.Hashtable user_opts,
                             long id)
This convenient constructor takes care of populating the wtro from the user options hash.
